    Searching the NPPES

Overview of Provider

Source: vignettes/provider.Rmd
provider.Rmd
library(provider)


There are three methods of entering search terms into the functions:

  • single 10-digit number
  • list of multiple 10-digit numbers
  • data frame of 10-digit numbers

I’ll create the example list and data frame I’ll be using in the examples for each API.


npi_list <- c(1003026055, 1316405939, 1720392988, 1518184605, 1922056829, 1083879860)
#> [1] 1003026055 1316405939 1720392988 1518184605 1922056829 1083879860


npi_data.frame <- data.frame(npi = c(1003026055, 1316405939, 1720392988, 1518184605, 1922056829, 1083879860))
#>          npi
#> 1 1003026055
#> 2 1316405939
#> 3 1720392988
#> 4 1518184605
#> 5 1922056829
#> 6 1083879860



NPPES NPI Public Registry API 

prov_npi_nppes(1003026055) |> prov_nppes_unpack()
#> # A tibble: 4 × 38
#>   prov_type npi     id    first…¹ last_…² middl…³ crede…⁴ sole_…⁵ gender enume…⁶

#> 1 NPI-1     100302… 1003… RADHIKA PHADKE  PUSHKAR M.D, P… NO      F      2007-0…
#> 2 NPI-1     100302… 1003… RADHIKA PHADKE  PUSHKAR M.D, P… NO      F      2007-0…
#> 3 NPI-1     100302… 1003… RADHIKA PHADKE  PUSHKAR M.D, P… NO      F      2007-0…
#> 4 NPI-1     100302… 1003… RADHIKA PHADKE  PUSHKAR M.D, P… NO      F      2007-0…
#> # … with 28 more variables: last_updated <chr>, status <chr>,
#> #   name_prefix <chr>, name_suffix <chr>, country_abb <chr>,

#> #   postal_code <chr>, telephone_number <chr>, fax_number <chr>,
#> #   taxon_code <chr>, taxon_desc <chr>, taxon_state <chr>, taxon_license <chr>,
#> #   taxon_primary <lgl>, ident_code <chr>, ident_desc <chr>, …

Medicare Fee-For-Service Public Provider Enrollment API

The Medicare Fee-For-Service Public Provider Enrollment dataset includes information on providers who are actively approved to bill Medicare or have completed the 855O at the time the data was pulled from the Provider Enrollment and Chain Ownership System (PECOS). These files are populated from PECOS and contain basic enrollment and provider information, reassignment of benefits information and practice location city, state and zip. These files are not intended to be used as real time reporting as the data changes from day to day and the files are updated only on a quarterly basis. This data does not include information on opt-out providers. Information is redacted where necessary to protect Medicare provider privacy.

Medicare Fee-For-Service Public Provider Enrollment API


prov_mcr_ffs(1003026055)
#>          NPI PECOS_ASCT_CNTL_ID       ENRLMT_ID PROVIDER_TYPE_CD
#> 1 1003026055         4486827367 I20170403002190            14-46
#>             PROVIDER_TYPE_DESC STATE_CD FIRST_NAME MDL_NAME LAST_NAME ORG_NAME
#> 1 PRACTITIONER - ENDOCRINOLOGY       FL    RADHIKA  PUSHKAR    PHADKE         
#>   GNDR_SW
#> 1       F


npi_list |> purrr::map_dfr(prov_mcr_ffs)
#>          NPI PECOS_ASCT_CNTL_ID       ENRLMT_ID PROVIDER_TYPE_CD
#> 1 1003026055         4486827367 I20170403002190            14-46
#> 2 1720392988         9537453808 I20160809001931            14-29
#> 3 1518184605         3971634056 I20121210000081            14-20
#> 4 1922056829         7416934294 I20041201001052            14-93
#> 5 1083879860         8426328519 I20200617001010            14-08
#>                  PROVIDER_TYPE_DESC STATE_CD  FIRST_NAME MDL_NAME LAST_NAME
#> 1      PRACTITIONER - ENDOCRINOLOGY       FL     RADHIKA  PUSHKAR    PHADKE
#> 2  PRACTITIONER - PULMONARY DISEASE       OH     MUSTAFA               ABAS
#> 3 PRACTITIONER - ORTHOPEDIC SURGERY       MA      DANIEL        L     AARON
#> 4 PRACTITIONER - EMERGENCY MEDICINE       MI     CYNTHIA        K     AARON
#> 5    PRACTITIONER - FAMILY PRACTICE       PA CHRISTOPHER        L     AARON
#>   ORG_NAME GNDR_SW
#> 1                F
#> 2                M
#> 3                M
#> 4                F
#> 5                M


npi_data.frame |> dplyr::group_split(npi) |> 
                  purrr::map_dfr(prov_mcr_ffs)
#>          NPI PECOS_ASCT_CNTL_ID       ENRLMT_ID PROVIDER_TYPE_CD
#> 1 1003026055         4486827367 I20170403002190            14-46
#> 2 1083879860         8426328519 I20200617001010            14-08
#> 3 1518184605         3971634056 I20121210000081            14-20
#> 4 1720392988         9537453808 I20160809001931            14-29
#> 5 1922056829         7416934294 I20041201001052            14-93
#>                  PROVIDER_TYPE_DESC STATE_CD  FIRST_NAME MDL_NAME LAST_NAME
#> 1      PRACTITIONER - ENDOCRINOLOGY       FL     RADHIKA  PUSHKAR    PHADKE
#> 2    PRACTITIONER - FAMILY PRACTICE       PA CHRISTOPHER        L     AARON
#> 3 PRACTITIONER - ORTHOPEDIC SURGERY       MA      DANIEL        L     AARON
#> 4  PRACTITIONER - PULMONARY DISEASE       OH     MUSTAFA               ABAS

Data Dictionary

  • Medicare Fee-For-Service Public Provider Enrollment - Data Dictionary
  • Reassignment Sub-File



Medicare Order and Referring API

The Order and Referring dataset provides information on all physicians and non-physician practitioners, by their National Provider Identifier (NPI), who are of a type/specialty that is legally eligible to order and refer in the Medicare program and who have current enrollment records in Medicare. This dataset is based on information gathered from the Provider Enrollment, Chain and Ownership System (PECOS).

Medicare Order and Referring API

prov_mcr_ordref(1003026055)
#>          NPI LAST_NAME FIRST_NAME PARTB DME HHA PMD
#> 1 1003026055    PHADKE    RADHIKA     Y   Y   Y   Y


npi_list |> purrr::map_dfr(prov_mcr_ordref)
#>          NPI LAST_NAME  FIRST_NAME PARTB DME HHA PMD
#> 1 1003026055    PHADKE     RADHIKA     Y   Y   Y   Y
#> 2 1316405939   ABARZUA       JAENA     N   Y   N   N
#> 3 1720392988      ABAS     MUSTAFA     Y   Y   Y   Y
#> 4 1518184605     AARON      DANIEL     Y   Y   Y   Y
#> 5 1922056829     AARON     CYNTHIA     Y   Y   Y   Y
#> 6 1083879860     AARON CHRISTOPHER     Y   Y   Y   Y


npi_data.frame |> dplyr::group_split(npi) |> 
                  purrr::map_dfr(prov_mcr_ordref)
#>          NPI LAST_NAME  FIRST_NAME PARTB DME HHA PMD
#> 1 1003026055    PHADKE     RADHIKA     Y   Y   Y   Y
#> 2 1083879860     AARON CHRISTOPHER     Y   Y   Y   Y
#> 3 1316405939   ABARZUA       JAENA     N   Y   N   N
#> 4 1518184605     AARON      DANIEL     Y   Y   Y   Y
#> 5 1720392988      ABAS     MUSTAFA     Y   Y   Y   Y
#> 6 1922056829     AARON     CYNTHIA     Y   Y   Y   Y
